dcterms:description: A comprehensive survey of various large-scale brain simulation projects that aim to replicate the functionality of biological brains.
dcterms:title: Large-scale brain simulation projects

dcterms:creator: Eugene M. Izhikevich
Gerald M. Edelman
dcterms:description: A large-scale computational model that simulates the thalamocortical systems of mammals, providing insights into brain function and dynamics.
dcterms:title: Large-scale model of mammalian thalamocortical systems

N. Brenner
N Tishby

dcterms:description: A study that explores the neural code, emphasizing the universality and individuality of neural representations and their implications for experience.
dcterms:title: Neural code

dcterms:description: Research providing direct evidence of quantum transport mechanisms in photosynthetic light-harvesting complexes, highlighting the role of quantum effects in biological processes.
dcterms:title: Quantum transport in photosynthetic light-harvesting complexes
